text: Hugh Alton Carter Sr. (August 13, 1920 â€“ June 24, 1999) was an American Democratic politician and businessman from Georgia. He was born in Plains, Georgia. Carter was a member of the Georgia State Senate from 1967 to 1981.Political Graveyard His cousin is former President Jimmy Carter. ==References== Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Plains, Georgia Category:Businesspeople from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Writers from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Jimmy Carter Category:1920 births Category:1999 deaths
title: Hugh Carter
